New Records: Kohli equalled Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Jadeja became the first Indian bowler to take a World Cup five-wicket haul
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 33 runs
South Africa were bowled out for 83 runs
Kuldeep Yadav bowled Ngidi to finish the match
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli expressed his enjoyment of playing cricket again and the special feeling of equalling Tendulkar's record on his birthday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Eden Gardens, Kolkata
India's total score was 326-5 in 50 overs
South Africa's score was 83 in 27.1 overs
